predictions.text: U.S. CPI (all items, seasonally adjusted) month-over-month for September 2025 will be between 0.15% and 0.30% in the BLS CPI release on 2025-10-10.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in BLS CPI-U Table 1 (seasonally adjusted percent changes) for September 2025, published on bls.gov/cpi on 2025-10-10.

predictions.text: U.S. Average Hourly Earnings (total private) year-over-year for September 2025 will be between 3.6% and 4.0% in the BLS Employment Situation on 2025-10-03.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check BLS Employment Situation tables (CES, series for average hourly earnings of all employees, total private) for YoY percent change for September 2025.
predictions.rationale: Wage growth is easing but remains above 3.5%, consistent with labor rebalancing without a sharp downturn.

predictions.text: At its 2025-10-23 meeting, the ECB will leave the deposit facility rate unchanged.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm the rate decision on ecb.europa.eu press release for 2025-10-23 or the Monetary Policy Statement; deposit facility rate must match prior setting.
predictions.rationale: Inflation is trending closer to target and growth is soft; the ECB likely pauses to assess transmission.

predictions.text: The Nasdaq-100 Index (^NDX) will close at or above 20,000 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify a daily close ≥ 20,000 for ^NDX on Yahoo Finance or Nasdaq by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.rationale: AI-driven earnings and user growth support upside; rate sensitivity caps confidence.

predictions.text: U.S. commercial crude oil inventories (excluding SPR) will reach at or above 440.0 million barrels in at least one EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report published by 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report summary table for 'Commercial crude oil inventories (excluding SPR)' ≥ 440.0 million barrels for any week published by 2025-11-15.
predictions.rationale: Autumn refinery turnarounds and steady production typically lift crude stocks.

predictions.text: The MBA Weekly Survey 30-year fixed mortgage rate (conforming) will print at or above 6.80% in at least one report released by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm in MBA Weekly Applications Survey press releases that the 30-year fixed (conforming) contract rate is ≥ 6.80% for any week reported by 2025-10-31.
predictions.rationale: Rate volatility remains elevated with term premia; brief spikes above 6.8% are plausible even as the trend eases.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, the EU Council will announce adoption of a new Russia-related sanctions package via an official press release or legal act on consilium.europa.eu or EUR-Lex.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify Council press release and/or publication of a new restrictive measures package against Russia on consilium.europa.eu or on EUR-Lex by 2025-10-31.
predictions.rationale: Continued conflict and circumvention concerns sustain EU pressure for additional listings and sectoral tweaks.

predictions.text: Meta Platforms (META) Q3 2025 revenue will be between $39.0B and $42.0B, per the company’s earnings release published by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check Meta investor relations press release/Form 8-K for reported Q3 2025 revenue; accept GAAP or non-GAAP top-line as stated in the release.
monitoring_signals: Digital ad peers’ results (GOOGL, SNAP, PINS)
predictions.rationale: User scale and improving ad tools support mid-to-high single-digit sequential Q3 uplift within the guided range.

predictions.text: The Drewry World Container Index Shanghai–Rotterdam weekly spot rate published on or before 2025-10-31 will be at least 20% higher than its 2025-09-05 reading.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare Drewry WCI Shanghai–Rotterdam level on 2025-09-05 vs any weekly reading through 2025-10-31; increase ≥ 20% satisfies.
predictions.rationale: Peak-season demand and rerouting pressures are lifting Transatlantic/Asia–Europe spot rates.

predictions.text: The U.S. Initial Jobless Claims 4-week moving average (seasonally adjusted) will reach at or above 230,000 in at least one weekly DOL report released by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm in the U.S. Department of Labor Unemployment Insurance Weekly Claims News Release tables that the 4-week moving average ≥ 230,000 in any release by 2025-10-31.
predictions.rationale: Cooling labor demand and weak seasonal hiring should nudge the smoother 4-week average higher.

predictions.text: USD/JPY (Yahoo Finance: JPY=X) will trade at or above 155.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify any intraday or closing print ≥ 155.00 for JPY=X on Yahoo Finance by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: BoJ policy guidance and JGB yield cap tolerance
predictions.rationale: Wide rate differentials and BoJ gradualism keep yen vulnerable despite intermittent intervention risks.

predictions.text: UK monthly GDP (ONS) for August 2025 will print between -0.2% and +0.3% month-over-month in the release due 2025-10-11.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check the ONS Monthly GDP release for August 2025 m/m growth rate; accept headline monthly GDP growth rate as published.
predictions.rationale: Mixed PMIs and soft retail suggest a flat-to-slightly positive monthly print amid ongoing stagnation.
